docs.abstract: The organization, criticized for its handling of a racism accusation, said it wouldn’t hold its annual contest after entrants and judges pulled out.
docs.snippet: The organization, criticized for its handling of a racism accusation, said it wouldn’t hold its annual contest after entrants and judges pulled out.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Romance Writers of America ended 2019 reeling from the backlash to its handling of a racism accusation. It is beginning this year by canceling its 2020 awards for romance novels, known in the industry as the Ritas, after it said that several contestants and judges had already pulled out.

headline.main: Romance Writers of America Cancels Awards Program
headline.print_headline: Romance Novel Awards Are Canceled This Year

docs.abstract: Last year there were many pop music lawsuits. Do you think there is a line between influencing, borrowing and stealing artistically?
docs.snippet: Last year there were many pop music lawsuits. Do you think there is a line between influencing, borrowing and stealing artistically?
docs.lead_paragraph: Have you ever heard two songs that sound remarkably similar? What about watched movies or read books with similar plot points or characters? Do you think there are instances when it is O.K. for artists to borrow from each other? Should there be consequences for artists to borrow too much?

headline.main: Should Musicians Be Allowed to Copy or Borrow From Other Artists?

docs.abstract: The maker of home speakers said Google and Amazon stole its technology and abused their power, but it could only risk suing one.
docs.snippet: The maker of home speakers said Google and Amazon stole its technology and abused their power, but it could only risk suing one.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTA BARBARA, Calif. — In 2013, Sonos scored a coup when Google agreed to design its music service to work easily with Sonos’s home speakers. For the project, Sonos handed over the effective blueprints to its speakers.

headline.main: Sonos, Squeezed by the Tech Giants, Sues Google
headline.print_headline: Sonos, Squeezed By the Tech Giants,  Sues Google

byline.original: By Jack Nicas and Daisuke Wakabayashi

docs.abstract: Iraqi officials say the Iranian strikes, involving at least a dozen ballistic missiles, caused no American or Iraqi casualties. President Trump issued an upbeat appraisal.
docs.snippet: Iraqi officials say the Iranian strikes, involving at least a dozen ballistic missiles, caused no American or Iraqi casualties. President Trump issued an upbeat appraisal.
docs.lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD — Iran attacked two bases in Iraq that house American troops with a barrage of missiles early Wednesday, Iranian official news media and United States officials said, fulfilling Tehran’s promise to retaliate for the killing of a top Iranian commander.

headline.main: Iran Fires on U.S. Forces at 2 Bases in Iraq, Calling It ‘Fierce Revenge’
headline.print_headline: Iranians Attack U.S. Forces in Iraq in Act of Revenge

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

byline.original: By Alissa J. Rubin, Farnaz Fassihi, Eric Schmitt and Vivian Yee

docs.abstract: When it comes to visual and performing arts, the Gulf countries are all about the future, and there’s no need to get in line or suffer selfie-stick fatigue.
docs.snippet: When it comes to visual and performing arts, the Gulf countries are all about the future, and there’s no need to get in line or suffer selfie-stick fatigue.
docs.lead_paragraph: DOHA, Qatar — The future of the art world may be in a vast desert landscape where audacious museums are melding both local culture and the outside world in a way that feels fresh and revolutionary.

headline.main: Skip the Vatican Museum. Go to the National Museum of Qatar.

docs.abstract: Lift that flap, peek through that hole, press that button. Interactive books keep little ones entertained — and help them develop cognitive abilities.
docs.snippet: Lift that flap, peek through that hole, press that button. Interactive books keep little ones entertained — and help them develop cognitive abilities.
docs.lead_paragraph: Sometimes I, a full-grown adult, see a so-called lift-the-flap book, meant for babies and toddlers, and become almost tingly with the desire to feel those cardboard tabs under my fingers and discover what’s hidden behind each one. It makes me suspect that interactive board books hit some primal sweet spot — and literacy research, it turns out, backs up my instinct. Our brains evolved to seek out and benefit from “multisensory” experiences, especially when our cognitive abilities are still developing. Young children exposed to books that engage more than one sense tend to have better comprehension and enthusiasm for reading down the road.

headline.main: Books That Captivate Babies and Toddlers

docs.abstract: His family perished in the Holocaust. He survived and went to the United States, where he worked with Ben Gazzara, George Peppard, Samuel Beckett and Arthur Miller.
docs.snippet: His family perished in the Holocaust. He survived and went to the United States, where he worked with Ben Gazzara, George Peppard, Samuel Beckett and Arthur Miller.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jack Garfein, a Holocaust survivor who became a noted director, producer and acting teacher, working with some of the greatest actors and playwrights of his era, died on Dec. 30 at a hospital in Manhattan. He was 89.

headline.main: Jack Garfein, Director From Actors Studio’s Heyday, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Jack Garfein, 89, Director In Actors Studio’s Heyday

docs.abstract: Religious institutions across the country are learning how to protect themselves. In Georgia, one small black church is taking action after a thwarted attack.
docs.snippet: Religious institutions across the country are learning how to protect themselves. In Georgia, one small black church is taking action after a thwarted attack.
docs.lead_paragraph: GAINESVILLE, Ga. — The tiny white church has new locks, peepholes and brass plates. While its parishioners pray, the sanctuary is bolted shut and a police officer is now stationed outside. Soon, surveillance cameras will be installed, and the 47-member congregation will participate in active-shooter training.

headline.main: Hurl Bibles or Hot Coffee: How One Church Is Preparing for Attacks
headline.print_headline: Learning How to Fight Back in a Small Georgia Church

docs.abstract: The intention, with no commitment to calling witnesses or admitting new evidence, foreshadows a partisan vote to kick off a divisive proceeding.
docs.snippet: The intention, with no commitment to calling witnesses or admitting new evidence, foreshadows a partisan vote to kick off a divisive proceeding.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Senator Mitch McConnell, the majority leader, said Tuesday that he planned to move forward with President Trump’s impeachment trial without committing to calling witnesses or hearing new evidence, foreshadowing a partisan vote to kick off a divisive proceeding.

headline.main: McConnell Says He Will Proceed on Impeachment Trial Without Witness Deal
headline.print_headline: Senate Might Begin Its Trial With No Witnesses

docs.abstract: In Marcial Gala’s novel “The Black Cathedral,” a visionary preacher comes up against the grim realities of life in a Cuban backwater.
docs.snippet: In Marcial Gala’s novel “The Black Cathedral,” a visionary preacher comes up against the grim realities of life in a Cuban backwater.

headline.main: A Fortress to Faith — or Faith’s Undoing?
